name: ResourceGroupDeprovisionTask
description: Deletes an existing Azure Resource Group
author: InCycleSoftwareInc-DEV

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Resource Manager Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager Subscription to target deployment.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Azure Resource Group for deletion.

inputs.name: Location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location for deploying the resource group. If the resource group already exists in the subscription, then this value will be ignored.

instanceNameFormat: Azure DevOps Accelerators - Deprovision Resource Group $($ResourceGroupName)
